title: Marksmans

replies.body: I think this might be the wrong sub-forum... rip

Correct, this board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

Your post would be better suited for [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) or [Misc](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).
